#Documentation

```%table-doc
{
    "table": "Users",
    "desc": "A table of users with their ID's, title and email",
    "columns": {
        "id": "INT",
        "title": "VARCHAR(100)",
        "email": "VARCHAR(100)",
        "date": "DATE()"
    },
    "example": [
    [1, "administrator", "admin@q.io", "1970-1-1T00:00:01"], 
    [2, "manager", "manager@q.io", "1970-1-1T00:00:01"], 
    [3, "user", "user@q.io", "1970-1-1T00:00:01"]
    ]
}
```
